ch0129_40_higana/0101_0701_01_10:
We bump into each other a lot,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! How many times has
it been now?
ch0129_40_higana/0101_0701_02_10:
But I guess it doesn’t matter! Just enjoy your
time on Pasio as much as you can.
ch0129_40_higana/7101_0701_02_10:
Do I look like a thief driven by selfish desires...
or a righteous outlaw that punishes evil?
ch0129_40_higana/7101_0701_03_10: Well, what you think doesn’t matter.
ch0129_40_higana/7101_0701_04_10:
Do what you have to do regardless of how others
see you.
ch0129_40_higana/7102_0701_01_10: Now I’m curious what you’re passionate about.
ch0129_40_higana/7102_0701_02_10: Tell me, and I’ll help however I can!
ch0129_40_higana/7103_0701_01_10:
Once I decide to do something, I see it through,
no matter what.
ch0129_40_higana/7103_0701_03_10: If you ever get in my way or hold me back...
ch0129_40_higana/7104_0701_02_10:
while Thievul pulls off an elegant heist. It’s a
clever bit of teamwork, isn’t it!
ch0129_40_higana/7104_0701_03_10:
If you want to know what a stylish steal looks like,
we’ll show you!
ch0129_40_higana/7104_0701_04_10:
But be careful... We might’ve stolen something
from you already!
ch0129_40_higana/7105_0701_01_10:
I, Zinnia, am a genius! There’s nothing in this
world I can’t steal!
ch0129_40_higana/7105_0701_03_10:
I could steal your heart, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0129_40_higana/1701_0701_01_10: I have a present for you!
ch0129_40_higana/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t worry! I didn’t steal it!
ch0129_40_higana/1701_0702_02_10:
Though if you wanted me to steal something for
you, I happily would.
ch0129_40_higana/2501_0701_01_10: It’s kinda weird when people call me a hero...
ch0129_40_higana/2501_0701_02_10:
I prefer being thought of as a thief who targets
evildoers.
ch0129_40_higana/2501_0702_01_10: I’ll let that boy from Devon be the hero.
ch0129_40_higana/2501_0702_02_10:
I’ll work in the shadows, while the public is
distracted by other things.
ch0129_40_higana/2511_0701_01_10: Some people in this world don’t listen to reason.
ch0129_40_higana/2511_0701_02_10:
So if you have to use force to get yourself out of
a bind...
ch0129_40_higana/2511_0701_03_10: Well, that’s fine in my book.
ch0129_40_higana/2511_0702_01_10:
If you’re ever in a situation where someone bad
threatens you...
ch0129_40_higana/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ll steal everything they’ve got to get back
at ’em!
ch0129_40_higana/3001_0701_01_10:
Hmm... Let’s try to guess what kind of adventures
are in store for us today. C’mon, use
your imagination!
ch0129_40_higana/3003_0701_01_10:
The sky is always the same, no matter where
you are... Wait, that’s not right. It’s actually
pretty different.
ch0129_40_higana/3005_0701_01_10:
Wow, I can’t believe it’s already this late. Maybe
we should leave things here for today and get
some rest!
